com.unibeta.cloudtest.config

Class ConfigurationProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.unibeta.cloudtest.config.ConfigurationProxy

  • public class ConfigurationProxy
extends java.lang.Object
    CloudTestConfigProxy is a test case configuration service proxy, provided all configuration accessing interface.
    Author:
    jordan.xue

      • getCloudTestRootPath

        public static java.lang.String getCloudTestRootPath()
        Gets the root path for cloud test configuration files. By default, it is 'cloudtest', which can be changed by setRootFolderName in runtime.
        Returns:
        root path
